title: Can we make Heal better for bruisers?
body:
I've started to play Mordekaiser because his win rate has risen to 60% with 8.11

But when I play him, I don't know which summoner spell to take
Ignite is taken by my support
Exhaust is legit fucking garbage

enemy adc has heal, but heal is worse on bruisers because if you build HP, the %max health that heal gives you will decrease

It would be nice if Heal healed for like 10-20% max hp depending on lvls instead of a flat amount

replies.body:
IDK where you got 60% wr from.....
http://na.op.gg/champion/mordekaiser/statistics/top
he's 46/52 in top lane wr
lolalytics states 0.1% pick rate and 59.5% win rate for adc mordekaiser

OOOOOH my b
ADC Mord is great is you know what you are doing. The build i post should still be used i think. Also you need a support with {{item:3302}}
They just nerfed heal so i dont think they gonna buff it but i would like to see some buffs, not for tanks uz we dont want new tank meta but just basic more heal

>enemy adc has heal, but heal is worse on bruisers because if you build HP, the %max health that heal gives you will decrease

Sorry to tell you this bit this is purely a psycological thing.

The value of heal isnt decreasing on bruisers.
You are healing for the same amount. Its just that because you have more max HP, it simply looks/feels like you are healing less than you are since the HP bar never gets bigger.

If anything, heal is already better on bruisers since they actually build defensive stats to make the health from heal worth more in total.
If morde had a 60% wr he would be the best champ in the game

he has a very very low pick rate which increases his win rate by a lot

fortunatly becaus he's fucking cancer
